actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to modify the computation of eligibility for certain Federal Pell Grants, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Pell Grant Eligibility Clarification Act of 2002

summary.text: Federal Pell Grant Eligibility Clarification Act of 2002 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise eligibility requirements for certain Pell Grant awards by modifying the formula for determining total income to include consideration of current year circumstances for students residing in States in extended benefit periods under the Temporary Extended Unemployment Compensation (Public Law 107-147).

titles.title: Federal Pell Grant Eligibility Clarification Act of 2002
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to modify the computation of eligibility for certain Federal Pell Grants, and for other purposes.
